Internship Retreat

The program provides a hands-on and immersive Ayurvedic experience, focusing on client-to-client interaction and thorough diagnostics. Participants delve into the intricacies of Ayurveda, gaining insights into system-wise examinations and herbal applications. Tailored for aspiring Ayurvedic Health Counselors and Practitioners, this preceptorship blends theoretical knowledge and practical skills for a transformative journey in Ayurvedic healthcare.

Your Teacher

Led by an esteemed Ayurvedic doctor with extensive years of practice and teaching, this internship offers unparalleled expertise in Ayurvedic medicine. The lead teacher embodies a wealth of knowledge and a passion for guiding students on their Ayurvedic journey.

Learn more

Internship Retreat Overview

The program offers a dynamic and immersive experience, placing a strong emphasis on client-to-client interaction, a fundamental cornerstone of Ayurvedic practice. Delving into the intricacies of Ayurveda, the retreat includes in-depth discussions on clients' conditions and procedures for effective treatment follow-up. Participants will engage in hands-on exploration of various diagnostic techniques, refining their diagnostic skills and fostering a deeper understanding of individualized patient care.

An integral aspect of the program is the systematic examination and knowledge enhancement pertaining to Ayurvedic principles. Participants will gain profound insights into system-wise examinations, further fortifying their foundation in Ayurvedic practices.

Beyond diagnostics, the program offers a holistic approach by imparting extensive knowledge about the utilization of various herbs in correcting Doshas and Agni, essential for the treatment correction process. Furthermore, engaging sessions on Dinacharya and Yoga are strategically designed to focus on therapeutic and rejuvenative practices, enriching participants with practical tools for holistic health.

Enriching the learning experience, the program hosts invited talks from esteemed experts in the fields of panchakarma, providing invaluable insights into advanced Ayurvedic therapies. Additionally, a structured schedule unfolds to explore the nuances of Ayurvedic cooking, imparting an in-depth understanding of dietary principles, Pathy apathya, and Virudhaahara.

As part of the program's immersive approach, participants embark on enlightening visits to botanical and herbal gardens. These excursions not only offer a firsthand experience with diverse herbs but also provide opportunities for organoleptic examinations, elevating the learning experience beyond theory.

Tailored for aspiring Ayurvedic Health Counselors and Ayurvedic Practitioners, this preceptorship promises a transformative journey, blending theoretical knowledge with hands-on experiences to empower participants in their path toward becoming proficient Ayurvedic healthcare practitioners.
